name: Flaaffy
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won’t grow.

attacks.name: Discharge
attacks.effect: Discard all {L} Energy cards attached to Flaaffy in order to use this attack. Flip a number of coins equal to the number of {L} Energy cards you discarded. This attack does 30 damage times then number of heads.

attacks.name: Electric Current
attacks.effect: Take 1 {L} Energy cards attached to Flaaffy and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon. If you have no Benched Pokémon, discard that Energy card.
